dialogue.content: My stomach gets uncomfortable at night sometimes.
Is it more burning, bloating, nausea, or cramps?
Burning, especially when I lie down.
Does it seem linked to certain foods, or more the timing of eating?
More timing. I often eat late and then go straight to bed.
Got it. Do you want small adjustments or a big overhaul?
Small adjustments. I'm not doing a whole new diet.
Perfect-timing tweaks are often the easiest place to start.
If I could stop the night burning without changing everything I eat, that would be ideal.
